#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int t,c,word,i;
   char sentence[1001];

   cin>>t;

   while((c=getchar()) !='\n' && c!=EOF);

   //fflush(stdin);

   while(t--)
   {

     scanf("%[^\n]s",sentence);

     while((c=getchar()) !='\n' && c!=EOF);

     word=0;

     //fflush(stdin);

     for(i=0;sentence[i]!='\0';i++)
     {

       if(sentence[i]==' ')
       word++;

     }

     cout<<word+1<<endl;

   }

   return 0;

}
